org.jcatapult.security.servlet
Interface CredentialStorage

All Known Implementing Classes:
HttpSessionCredentialStorage
public interface CredentialStorage

This class provides a mechanism for locating user credentials within a Servlet container.

Author:
Brian Pontarelli

Method Summary
 Object locate(ServletRequest request)
          Locates the user credentials.
 void remove(ServletRequest request)
          Removes the stored user credentials if there are any.
 void store(Object credentials, ServletRequest request)
          Stores the user credentials into a persistent storage location so that they can be retrieved across multiple requests.
 

Method Detail

locate

Object locate(ServletRequest request)
Locates the user credentials.

Parameters:
request - The HTTP servlet request if it is needed to help find the credentials.
Returns:
The user credentials or null if there are none (i.e. the user is not logged in).

store

void store(Object credentials,
           ServletRequest request)
Stores the user credentials into a persistent storage location so that they can be retrieved across multiple requests.

Parameters:
credentials - The credentials to store.
request - The HTTP servlet request if it is needed to store the credentials.

remove

void remove(ServletRequest request)
Removes the stored user credentials if there are any.

Parameters:
request - The HTTP servlet request if it is needed to remove the credentials.
